name: CyberSlash
description:
A 2D cyberpunk themed hack&slash game developed for the GamesPlusJames 3 Game Jam. This small game was designed over the weekend, solo. 

Credit for asset use:

Environment Art Assets: https://ansimuz.itch.io/warped-city

Character Design: https://stensven.itch.io/hero-knight

Music: SoundCloud Synthwave Royalty Free Tracks

Sound Design: By SwissArcadeGameEntertainment
